001package imagingbook.parboiled.examples.indenting;
002
003import imagingbook.parboiled.parser.BaseParser;
004import imagingbook.parboiled.parser.BaseParser;
005import imagingbook.parboiled.Rule;
006import imagingbook.parboiled.annotations.BuildParseTree;
007
008@BuildParseTree
009public class SimpleIndent extends BaseParser<IndentNode> {
010
011        Rule Parent() {
012                return Sequence(push(new IndentNode("root")), OneOrMore(Data()), EOI);
013        }
014
015        Rule Data() {
016                return Sequence(Identifier(), push(new IndentNode(match())), peek(1)
017                                .addChild(peek()),
018                                Optional(Sequence(Spacing(), ChildNodeList())), drop());
019        }
020
021        Rule ChildNodeList() {
022                return Sequence(INDENT, Spacing(), OneOrMore(Data(), Spacing()), DEDENT);
023        }
024
025        Rule Identifier() {
026                return Sequence(PN_CHARS_U(), ZeroOrMore(PN_CHARS_DIGIT_U()));
027        }
028
029        public Rule PN_CHARS_DIGIT_U() {
030                return FirstOf(PN_CHARS_U(), DIGIT());
031        }
032
033        public Rule PN_CHARS_U() {
034                return FirstOf(PN_CHARS_BASE(), '_');
035        }
036
037        public Rule PN_CHARS_BASE() {
038                return FirstOf( 
039                                CharRange('A', 'Z'),
040                                CharRange('a', 'z'), 
041                                CharRange('\u00C0', '\u00D6'), 
042                                CharRange('\u00D8', '\u00F6'), 
043                                CharRange('\u00F8', '\u02FF'), 
044                                CharRange('\u0370', '\u037D'), 
045                                CharRange('\u037F', '\u1FFF'), 
046                                CharRange('\u200C', '\u200D'), 
047                                CharRange('\u2070', '\u218F'), 
048                                CharRange('\u2C00', '\u2FEF'), 
049                                CharRange('\u3001', '\uD7FF'), 
050                                CharRange('\uF900', '\uFDCF'), 
051                                CharRange('\uFDF0', '\uFFFD') 
052                );
053        }
054
055        public Rule DIGIT() {
056                return CharRange('0', '9');
057        }
058
059        Rule Spacing() {
060                return ZeroOrMore(AnyOf(" \t\r\n\f").label("Whitespace"));
061        }
062}
